statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = '3d8f1703-56fd-4e0b-85cc-ef9506c3f587' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT account_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE account_type = 'savings';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT target_name, status FROM targets WHERE account_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT target_name, status FROM targets WHERE account_id = 500 ORDER BY target_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, date FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT target_name, threat_level FROM targets WHERE last_seen_location = 'New York';
SELECT owner_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE target_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT target_name, threat_level FROM targets WHERE threat_level >= 5 ORDER BY target_name ASC;
SELECT account_number, balance, owner_name, created_date FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts WHERE account_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE target_status = 'active' ORDER BY target_id;
SELECT technique_id, technique_name FROM social_engineering WHERE technique_name LIKE '%phishing%';
